welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Selston, where the charming countryside meets small-town charm! We hope you enjoy your stay and take the time to explore our scenic landscape and immerse yourself in our local traditions."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Nottingham Airport offers a variety of services and amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Nottingham Airport handles all freight and cargo operations for the airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at East Midlands Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at East Midlands Airport, primarily used for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, with no time limit.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Robin Hood Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the terminal.
